status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

worklogs.comment:
raulcd opened a new pull request, #14138:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14138

   The s390x builds currently time out on Travis-CI while compiling Arrow C++.
   
   I'll create a new ticket to follow this up but on the meantime we probably should allow them to fail.

github-actions[bot] commented on PR #14138:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14138#issuecomment-1248378732

   https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17715

github-actions[bot] commented on PR #14138:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14138#issuecomment-1248378756

   :warning: Ticket **has not been started in JIRA**, please click 'Start Progress'.

pitrou commented on PR #14138:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14138#issuecomment-1249105832

   cc @kiszk for information.

pitrou commented on PR #14138:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14138#issuecomment-1249106845

   > @pitrou should we do this?
   
   I'm in favor, since I don't think there's much else we can easily do.

kiszk commented on PR #14138:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14138#issuecomment-1249116579

   Looks fine to allow failure now. I will check the reason of timeout.

kou merged PR #14138:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14138

ursabot commented on PR #14138:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14138#issuecomment-1250232944

   Benchmark runs are scheduled for baseline = edf03109ec519dcb1fce815d9d6898cce1ca21a6 and contender = 02b24f72920174d554e61c67bdf33a5ee4764bd6. 02b24f72920174d554e61c67bdf33a5ee4764bd6 is a master commit associated with this PR. Results will be available as each benchmark for each run completes.
   Conbench compare runs links:
   [Finished :arrow_down:0.0% :arrow_up:0.0%] [ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/1d2ed97993504e1eb189b475b7518681...b61f5b89d20b4d4aa1ae0ba38d13acc3/)
   [Failed :arrow_down:0.65% :arrow_up:0.27%] [test-mac-arm](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/df0766ecd54b4e7aa65032d3cadadc6d...6eedfe5e509e45e3a25bc53931418eeb/)
   [Failed :arrow_down:0.0% :arrow_up:0.0%] [ursa-i9-9960x](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/90b6c40c6e684d5b8995143165b098de...f5f87a899b17461ea010acf29f07fcf0/)
   [Finished :arrow_down:0.39% :arrow_up:0.04%] [ursa-thinkcentre-m75q](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/3d8029db9b0d466ebb72e4c5b0870b5b...3808fc917cc44b668faa3461b5c914a0/)
   Buildkite builds:
   [Finished] [`02b24f72` ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2](https://buildkite.com/apache-arrow/arrow-bci-benchmark-on-ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2/builds/1512)
   [Failed] [`02b24f72` test-mac-arm](https://buildkite.com/apache-arrow/arrow-bci-benchmark-on-test-mac-arm/builds/1529)
   [Failed] [`02b24f72` ursa-i9-9960x](https://buildkite.com/apache-arrow/arrow-bci-benchmark-on-ursa-i9-9960x/builds/1512)
   [Finished] [`02b24f72` ursa-thinkcentre-m75q](https://buildkite.com/apache-arrow/arrow-bci-benchmark-on-ursa-thinkcentre-m75q/builds/1526)
   [Finished] [`edf03109` ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2](https://buildkite.com/apache-arrow/arrow-bci-benchmark-on-ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2/builds/1511)
   [Finished] [`edf03109` test-mac-arm](https://buildkite.com/apache-arrow/arrow-bci-benchmark-on-test-mac-arm/builds/1528)
   [Failed] [`edf03109` ursa-i9-9960x](https://buildkite.com/apache-arrow/arrow-bci-benchmark-on-ursa-i9-9960x/builds/1511)
   [Finished] [`edf03109` ursa-thinkcentre-m75q](https://buildkite.com/apache-arrow/arrow-bci-benchmark-on-ursa-thinkcentre-m75q/builds/1525)

   ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2: Supported benchmark langs: Python, R. Runs only benchmarks with cloud = True

ursabot commented on PR #14138:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14138#issuecomment-1250232980

   ['Python', 'R'] benchmarks have high level of regressions.
   [ursa-i9-9960x](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/90b6c40c6e684d5b8995143165b098de...f5f87a899b17461ea010acf29f07fcf0/)

kiszk opened a new pull request, #14169:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14169

   Current setting causes timeout during C++ compilation.

github-actions[bot] commented on PR #14169:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14169#issuecomment-1251370986

   https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17715

github-actions[bot] commented on PR #14169:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14169#issuecomment-1251371032

   :warning: Ticket **has not been started in JIRA**, please click 'Start Progress'.

pitrou commented on PR #14169:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14169#issuecomment-1259842558

   This doesn't seem to have worked unfortunately...

kiszk commented on PR #14169:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14169#issuecomment-1259852184

   Why do these two job cause time-out at different points?
   
   https://app.travis-ci.com/github/apache/arrow/jobs/583166216#L2767-L2771
   
   https://app.travis-ci.com/github/apache/arrow/jobs/583241288#L2774-L2779

pitrou commented on PR #14169:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14169#issuecomment-1259869924

   I have no idea. I'm afraid the s390x workers on Travis-CI are generally unreliable.

kou commented on PR #14169:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14169#issuecomment-1260054849

   It seems that the s390x workers on Travis CI don't have enough resource to build gRPC and Gandiva stably. How about disabling Flight and Gandiva?

kiszk commented on PR #14169:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14169#issuecomment-1262380345

   Thanks, let me disable some components one by one.

kiszk commented on PR #14169:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14169#issuecomment-1262388119

   I just found another (possible) solution [`travis_wait n`](https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/common-build-problems/#build-times-out-because-no-output-was-received)

kiszk commented on PR #14169:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14169#issuecomment-1262998229

   `travis_wait` workaround allows us to finish build. On the other hand, CI found on failure.
   ```
   33/75 Test #36: arrow-compute-asof-join-node-test .........***Failed    1.25 sec
   Running arrow-compute-asof-join-node-test, redirecting output into /build/cpp/build/test-logs/arrow-compute-asof-join-node-test.txt (attempt 1/1)
   /arrow/cpp/build-support/run-test.sh: line 88: 30112 Aborted                 (core dumped) $TEST_EXECUTABLE "$@" > $LOGFILE.raw 2>&1
   ```
   
   [This assertion|https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/compute/exec/util.cc#L35] causes the failure. I will address this in another PR.

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
The s390x builds currently time out on Travis-CI while compiling Arrow C++.
The s390x execution resources at Travis-CI are probably too weak for compiling Arrow...
